name: BOOZ ALLEN HAMILTON INC.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the annual appropriations process.
H.R.5515 / S.2987, National Defense Authorization Act, 2019, all titles, all provisions relating to rapid acquisition authorities and security clearances.
H.R.6157 / S.3159, Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2019, all titles, all provisions relating to rapid acquisition authorities.

Contacted Members of Congress and their staff to provide information about the company. 

Contacted Members of Congress and their staff regarding an industry event.
Contacted Congressional offices to provide information on the company, its federal programs, and trusted workforce.
Provided information to Members of Congress and their staff regarding a House Veterans Affairs Committee hearing on Electronic Health Records.
H.R.2500 / S.1790, National Defense Authorization Act, 2020, Title VIII, all provisions related to military spouse employment.
H.R.2968 / S.2474, Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2020, Titles III and IV, all provisions relating to accessions information technology.
Contacted Congressional offices to provide information on the company, its federal programs, trusted workforce, and to invite them to an exhibit an an upcoming industry event.

H.R.3494 / S.1589, Damon Paul Nelson and Matthew Young Pollard Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Years 2018, 2019, and 2020, all provisions relating to cybersecurity and next generation networks.
Contacted Congressional offices to invite them to an exhibit an an upcoming industry event.

H.R.2500 / S.1790, National Defense Authorization Act, 2020, Title VIII, all provisions related to military spouse employment. 

Contacted Congressional offices regarding the Future of Defense Task Force.
